title.value: AICOM-MP: AN AI-BASED MONKEYPOX DETECTOR FOR RESOURCE-CONSTRAINED ENVIRONMENTS
title.justification: The title clearly indicates the focus of the paper is on AICOM-MP, an AI-based system for detecting monkeypox in environments with limited resources.
title.quote: AICOM-MP: AN AI-BASED MONKEYPOX DETECTOR FOR RESOURCE-CONSTRAINED ENVIRONMENTS

extractions.description: The paper presents AICOM-MP, a state-of-the-art AI-based monkeypox detection system designed to operate in resource-constrained environments. The system is intended to improve healthcare access in less developed countries by integrating into Autonomous Mobile Clinics (AMCs). This includes constructing and open-sourcing the AICOM-MP dataset and hosting the system as a web service for universal access. The methodology developed also provides a general framework for creating health AI technologies for various diseases beyond monkeypox.

type.justification: The paper presents the development, implementation, and evaluation of AICOM-MP, providing empirical results on its performance compared to existing models.
type.quote: In this section, we perform a comprehensive study to evaluate AICOM-MP. We compare AICOM-MP to existing models on various datasets as well as real-world data to demonstrate that AICOM-MP is the SOTA in monkeypox screening.

name.justification: The primary focus of the research is on applying AI technologies to healthcare, specifically for detecting monkeypox, which classifies it as Health AI.
name.quote: Keywords Health AI · Monkeypox · Autonomous Mobile Clinics · SDG3

name.justification: The paper discusses using image detection techniques and deep learning models to identify monkeypox from images, which falls under the domain of Computer Vision.
name.quote: Islam et al [9] and Patel et al [10] demonstrated the prospects of detecting monkeypox through deep learning CV models.

name.justification: AICOM-MP is the central contribution of the paper as an AI-based model for detecting monkeypox.
name.quote: Under the AMCs initiative and facing the recent global monkeypox outbreak, in this article we introduce AICOM-MP, an AI-based monkeypox detector that has achieved SOTA performance.

is_contributed.justification: The paper contributes the AICOM-MP model to the field as it achieves state-of-the-art performance in monkeypox detection.
is_contributed.quote: We have developed AICOM-MP in the form of web service to allow universal access of monkeypox screening technology.

is_executed.justification: The model is implemented in a web service form which implies execution.
is_executed.quote: We have developed AICOM-MP in the form of web service to allow universal access of monkeypox screening technology.

is_compared.justification: AICOM-MP is compared with existing models on detection accuracy and other performance metrics.
is_compared.quote: We compare AICOM-MP to existing models on various datasets as well as real-world data to demonstrate that AICOM-MP is the SOTA in monkeypox screening.

referenced_paper_title.value: AICOM-MP: AN AI-BASED MONKEYPOX DETECTOR FOR RESOURCE-CONSTRAINED ENVIRONMENTS
referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference for the model is the current paper itself as it is introduced and evaluated within this document.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Under the AMCs initiative and facing the recent global monkeypox outbreak, in this article we introduce AICOM-MP, an AI-based monkeypox detector that has achieved SOTA performance.

name.justification: The EfficientNetB7 model is explicitly used in the development of the AICOM-MP pipeline for classification tasks.
name.quote: ...we resort to EfficientNetB7 which has an architecture designed for performance on mobile CPU...

is_contributed.justification: EfficientNetB7 is a previously established model and is utilized within AICOM-MP rather than being introduced by this paper.
is_contributed.quote: ...we resort to EfficientNetB7 which has an architecture designed for performance on mobile CPU...

is_executed.justification: EfficientNetB7 is used within the AICOM-MP pipeline, indicating it was executed as part of the experiments.
is_executed.quote: ...we resort to EfficientNetB7 which has an architecture designed for performance on mobile CPU...

is_compared.justification: EfficientNetB7 is compared alongside other models for performance evaluation within the AICOM-MP framework.
is_compared.quote: when we switched from using EfficientNetB3 to using EfficientNetB7...we noticed an increase...

referenced_paper_title.value: EfficientNet: Rethinking model scaling for convolutional neural networks
referenced_paper_title.justification: EfficientNetB7 references this existing paper as it is part of the EfficientNet family discussed there.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Mingxing Tan and Quoc Le. EfficientNet: Rethinking model scaling for convolutional neural networks. In Kamalika Chaudhuri and Ruslan Salakhutdinov, editors, Proceedings of the 36th International Conference on Machine Learning, volume 97 of Proceedings of Machine Learning Research, pages 6105–6114. PMLR, 09–15 Jun 2019.

name.justification: U2-Net is used within the AICOM-MP pipeline for segmentation tasks as part of the background removal process.
name.quote: We selected the U 2 -Net DL model and used its pre-trained weights to carry out object detection and background removal tasks.

is_contributed.justification: The U2-Net model was developed previously and is used as a part of this research's pipeline rather than being contributed by this paper.
is_contributed.quote: We selected the U 2 -Net DL model and used its pre-trained weights to carry out object detection and background removal tasks.

is_executed.justification: U2-Net is utilized within the AICOM-MP's image processing tasks indicating it was executed.
is_executed.quote: We selected the U 2 -Net DL model and used its pre-trained weights to carry out object detection and background removal tasks.

is_compared.justification: While used in the AICOM-MP architecture, U2-Net isn't numerically compared against alternative segmentation models within this paper.
is_compared.quote: We selected the U 2 -Net DL model and used its pre-trained weights to carry out object detection and background removal tasks.

referenced_paper_title.value: U2-Net: Going deeper with nested u-structure for salient object detection
referenced_paper_title.justification: U2-Net references this existing paper as it outlines the use of U2-Net in segmentation tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Xuebin Qin, Zichen Zhang, Chenyang Huang, Masood Dehghan, Osmar Zaiane, and Martin Jagersand. U2-net: Going deeper with nested u-structure for salient object detection. volume 106, page 107404, 2020.

name.justification: This dataset was specifically constructed for the AICOM-MP model with a focus on monkeypox detection.
name.quote: we have constructed the AICOM-MP dataset to optimize coverage, diversification, and generalization, and we have open-sourced the dataset for other health AI professional to improve upon.

referenced_paper_title.value: AICOM-MP: AN AI-BASED MONKEYPOX DETECTOR FOR RESOURCE-CONSTRAINED ENVIRONMENTS
referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset is introduced and described in this paper as a contribution to the field.
referenced_paper_title.quote: we have constructed the AICOM-MP dataset to optimize coverage, diversification, and generalization.

name.justification: COCO 2017 is used as a source of images to enrich the AICOM-MP dataset and for additional testing.
name.quote: We generated a new test dataset COCO_MP dataset, which consists of 200 manually selected COCO 2017 dataset [23] and 132 original monkeypox images.

referenced_paper_title.value: Microsoft COCO: common objects in context
referenced_paper_title.justification: COCO dataset is a widely used benchmark dataset in object detection and segmentation.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Tsung-Yi Lin, Michael Maire, Serge J. Belongie, Lubomir D. Bourdev, Ross B. Girshick, James Hays, Pietro Perona, Deva Ramanan, Piotr Doll’a r, and C. Lawrence Zitnick. Microsoft COCO: common objects in context. CoRR, abs/1405.0312, 2014.

name.justification: This dataset is used for selecting healthy hand images to balance the training data of the AICOM-MP dataset.
name.quote: We selected 18 healthy hand and 18 healthy face images from the 11k hands dataset [14].

referenced_paper_title.value: 11k Hands: gender recognition and biometric identification using a large dataset of hand images
referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference provides context about the origin of healthy image samples used for balance in the dataset.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Mahmoud Afifi. 11k hands: gender recognition and biometric identification using a large dataset of hand images. Multimedia Tools and Applications, 2019.

name.justification: This dataset contributed healthy face images used for balancing the AICOM-MP dataset.
name.quote: We selected 18 healthy hand and 18 healthy face images from the 11k hands dataset [14] and Flickr-Faces-HQ Dataset [15].

referenced_paper_title.value: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
referenced_paper_title.justification: This paper outlines the foundation of the dataset which was employed for face image selection.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Tero Karras, Samuli Laine, and Timo Aila. A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks. In Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), June 2019.

name.justification: This library is used for data augmentation purposes to address dataset imbalance.
name.quote: Seven augmentation operations have been applied to the web-scrapped images using ImageDataGenerator from Keras.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Keras is a well-established library for deep learning often used for data preprocessing and augmentations.

name.justification: TensorFlow is used as part of the data augmentation processes in the study.
name.quote: ...using the ImageGenerator function from Tensorflow Keras.

referenced_paper_title.value: TensorFlow: Large-Scale Machine Learning on Heterogeneous Systems
referenced_paper_title.justification: TensorFlow is a foundational framework that supports operations described in the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: TensorFlow: Large-Scale Machine Learning on Heterogeneous Systems, [Online] 2015.
